includedAssets.title: The Original
includedAssets.synopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where every human desire can be indulged begin to notice issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where every human desire can be indulged begin to notice issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where every human desire can be indulged begin to notice issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.

includedAssets.title: Chesnut
includedAssets.synopsis: Two new guests take a trip to Westworld and explore the possibilities offered to them. A popular host faces being decommissioned.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two new guests take a trip to Westworld and explore the possibilities offered to them. A popular host faces being decommissioned.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two new guests take a trip to Westworld and explore the possibilities offered to them. A popular host faces being decommissioned.

includedAssets.title: The Stray
includedAssets.synopsis: As the hosts' abnormal behaviour continues, Westworld's enigmatic creator (Sir Anthony Hopkins) takes on the creative direction of the park.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the hosts' abnormal behaviour continues, Westworld's enigmatic creator (Sir Anthony Hopkins) takes on the creative direction of the park.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the hosts' abnormal behaviour continues, Westworld's enigmatic creator (Sir Anthony Hopkins) takes on the creative direction of the park.

includedAssets.title: Dissonance Theory
includedAssets.synopsis: The Man in Black allies himself with one of Westworld's most ruthless bandits, while Maeve is disturbed by a recurring vision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Man in Black allies himself with one of Westworld's most ruthless bandits, while Maeve is disturbed by a recurring vision.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Man in Black allies himself with one of Westworld's most ruthless bandits, while Maeve is disturbed by a recurring vision.

includedAssets.title: Contrapasso
includedAssets.synopsis: The Man in Black makes an unlikely ally in his search to unlock The Maze. William and Delores embark on a new mission.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Man in Black makes an unlikely ally in his search to unlock The Maze. William and Delores embark on a new mission.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Man in Black makes an unlikely ally in his search to unlock The Maze. William and Delores embark on a new mission.

includedAssets.title: The Adversary
includedAssets.synopsis: Maeve gets some answers and Elsie finds signs of possible sabotage, while The Man in Black and Teddy run afoul of a garrison.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Maeve gets some answers and Elsie finds signs of possible sabotage, while The Man in Black and Teddy run afoul of a garrison.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Maeve gets some answers and Elsie finds signs of possible sabotage, while The Man in Black and Teddy run afoul of a garrison.

includedAssets.title: Trompe L'oeil
includedAssets.synopsis: As Delores and William continue to tread into dangerous territory, Maeve delivers her ultimatum.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Delores and William continue to tread into dangerous territory, Maeve delivers her ultimatum.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Delores and William continue to tread into dangerous territory, Maeve delivers her ultimatum.

includedAssets.title: Trace Decay
includedAssets.synopsis: Bernard struggles with a mandate issued to him. Teddy is troubled by dark memories, while Maeve looks to change her script.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bernard struggles with a mandate issued to him. Teddy is troubled by dark memories, while Maeve looks to change her script.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bernard struggles with a mandate issued to him. Teddy is troubled by dark memories, while Maeve looks to change her script.

includedAssets.title: The Well-Tempered Clavier
includedAssets.synopsis: Maeve makes a proposition to Hector. Teddy finds enlightenment, but at great cost, while others reconnect with their past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Maeve makes a proposition to Hector. Teddy finds enlightenment, but at great cost, while others reconnect with their past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Maeve makes a proposition to Hector. Teddy finds enlightenment, but at great cost, while others reconnect with their past.

includedAssets.title: The Bicameral Mind
includedAssets.synopsis: As Ford unveils his vision for a bold new narrative, Delores accepts who she is and Maeve sets her plan in motion.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Ford unveils his vision for a bold new narrative, Delores accepts who she is and Maeve sets her plan in motion.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Ford unveils his vision for a bold new narrative, Delores accepts who she is and Maeve sets her plan in motion.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Prepare for a trip unlike any other. From JJ Abrams and Jonathan Nolan comes this darkly mesmerising sci-fi epic starring Anthony Hopkins and Ed Harris.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Prepare for a trip unlike any other. From JJ Abrams and Jonathan Nolan comes this darkly mesmerising sci-fi epic. Anthony Hopkins and Ed Harris star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Prepare for a trip unlike any other. From JJ Abrams and Jonathan Nolan comes this darkly mesmerising sci-fi epic starring Anthony Hopkins and Ed Harris.

includedIn.title: Westworld
includedIn.synopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where guests live out their darkest desires begin to have issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where guests live out their darkest desires begin to have issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The operators of a high-tech theme park where guests live out their darkest desires begin to have issues with their artificially intelligent 'hosts'.
